Class com.qoppa.pdf.PDFRenderHints

Removed Methods
void addSubstituteFont(String, Font) Registers a substitute font to use when a font in a PDF file is not embedded in the file and the font is not registered with the operating system.
String getCJKSystemFontName(int) Get the name of the system font that will be used to render non-embedded instances of the CJK font type indicated by cjkFontType
Font getSubstituteFont(String) Returns a substitute font, if one has been registered, for the given font name.
void setCJKSystemFontName(int, String) Set the local system font systemFontName to use for a particular CJK font type cjkFontType
void setUseSubstituteFont(boolean) Tells the rendering engine to use a substitute font when a font in the PDF cannot be created for any reasons.
